company: Simulation Software and Technology Pte Ltd
description: Worked on web/cyber intelligence project and data discovery solutions that empowers the law enforcement agencies to identify emerging public security threats, track suspects online, and gather information on illicit activities.

Created and enhance multiple cloud based applications (coupon, admin, merchants) that are part the SKPlanet's Saas Platform. Re-engineered and implemented solutions that prepares the business for regional market expansion in South-East Asia.

Developed various enterprise-level web applications in the field of E-commerce, Real-Estate, Printing, and Education. Built reusable widgets that empowers non-technical designers to assemble sophisticated websites.
